name: firefox-extension

scripts.build: esbuild background.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/background.js && esbuild options.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/options.js && esbuild utils/media-interceptor.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/media-interceptor.js && esbuild content-script.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/content-script.js && esbuild popup.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/popup.js

description: Browser Control MCP Firefox Extension / Add-on
